<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// GetValueAtEndOfBlock - Construct SSA form, materializing a value that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// live at the end of the specified block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#aa7bb344ec6cbf767f3fa163c13b4e883">GetValueAtEndOfBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// GetValueInMiddleOfBlock - Construct SSA form, materializing a value that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is live in the middle of the specified block. If ExistingValueOnly is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// true then this will only return an existing value or $noreg; otherwise new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions may be inserted to materialize a value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// GetValueInMiddleOfBlock is the same as GetValueAtEndOfBlock except in one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// important case: if there is a definition of the rewritten value after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;use&#39; in BB.  Consider code like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      X1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   SomeBB:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      use(X)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      X2 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      br Cond, SomeBB, OutBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In this case, there are two values (X1 and X2) added to the AvailableVals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set by the client of the rewriter, and those values are both live out of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// their respective blocks.  However, the use of X happens in the &#42;middle&#42; of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a block.  Because of this, we need to insert a new PHI node in SomeBB to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// merge the appropriate values, and this value isn&#39;t live out of the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#a670da7741129c7d591dc19951ecce6c3">GetValueInMiddleOfBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExistingValueOnly = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// RewriteUse - Rewrite a use of the symbolic value.  This handles PHI nodes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// which use their value in the corresponding predecessor.  Note that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will not work if the use is supposed to be rewritten to a value defined in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the same block as the use, but above it.  Any &#39;AddAvailableValue&#39;s added</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for the use&#39;s block will be considered to be below it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#a71a08885f7838dc5a544816a357e2ec7">RewriteUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If ExistingValueOnly is true, will not create any new instructions. Used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for debug values, which cannot modify Codegen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> GetValueAtEndOfBlockInternal(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExistingValueOnly = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
